summary: This module connects LlamaIndex callback events to the Chainlit interface, converting LlamaIndex schema objects and chat messages into Chainlit UI updates so that LLM interactions and node retrievals can be visualized in real time.
business_intent: Enable developers to monitor, debug, and understand LLM workflows by providing live visual feedback of LlamaIndex operations within the Chainlit environment, improving observability and troubleshooting capabilities.
